entry.title: SBT Multi-Project Basics
entry.content:
I've grown very fond of lieningen for managing dependencies and builds with Java and Clojure projects. However, I'm currently working with some projects that rely on SBT for their build system.. namely the Play! Framework.

The project I'm working with is a vanilla Play! build with a number of submodules to break out functionality into reusable submodules. Let's get started with Play! as an example since it bundles SBT
